title: Rebuilding Year
description: The Hampden County Hyenas are a hockey team that is a bit unusual. They really are hyenas-or boudas. Much like werewolves they are both man and beast-a perfect fit for hockey. It is a rebuilding year for the team and it's time to hunt for a new recruit.A humorous paranormal fantasy short story- 3103 words
author: Elizabeth Inglee-Richards
